sentences.en: Achnatherum splendens , belongs to the grass family, largely distributes in Loess Plateau.
sentences.cn: 芨芨草是黄土高原地区广泛分布的禾本科植物.

sentences.en: And then a structural constitutive model of unsaturatedstructural loess is obtained.
sentences.cn: 最终,得到了非饱和原状结构性黄土的结构性数学模型.

sentences.en: Could there have been a really large dam that caused a deep lake in both Zharu and the main valleys and is older than the loess deposits?
sentences.cn: 这儿有可能有一个真正巨大的大坝，导致扎如和主峡谷之间的深湖，并且时间比黄土沉积物还久远吗？

sentences.en: In Malan Loess, the three nitrogen transform by nitrification and denitrification.
sentences.cn: 在马兰黄土中, 影响三氮转化的主要作用有硝化作用和反硝化作用.

sentences.en: Irrigated farming is the primary kind of agricultures in loess plateau.
sentences.cn: 黄土高原自然条件特殊,耕作农业以引水灌溉为主.

sentences.en: Is located in loess hilly region, serious soil erosion.
sentences.cn: 地处黄土丘陵区, 水土流失严重.

sentences.en: Loess is the central and western art on a wonderful work.
sentences.cn: 是中西部黄土地上一支艺术奇葩.

sentences.en: Loess soil in the territory of the most widely distributed.
sentences.cn: 境内以黄绵土分布最为广泛.

sentences.en: Most loess is considered to be an eolian deposit.
sentences.cn: 大多数黄土被认为是一种风成沉积.

sentences.en: Prehistoric Vegetation on the Loess Plateau: Steppe or Forest?
sentences.cn: 史前黄土高原的自然植被景观──森林还是草原?

sentences.en: The moisture has a remarkable effect on structural strength of loess.
sentences.cn: 含水量对黄土结构强度构成显著的影响.

sentences.en: The Taoist ignited the loess - made yellow paper when offering sacrifice.
sentences.cn: 道士在祭祀时点燃了黄表纸.

sentences.en: The tensile character of undisturbed loess is analysed by monaxial tension tests.
sentences.cn: 通过单轴拉伸试验,研究原状黄土的拉伸特性.

sentences.en: Then something strange happened: The loess in the terraces wasn’t on top of crushed rock anymore — it was on top of very finely laminated clay-rich sediments.
sentences.cn: 然后一些很奇怪的事儿发生了： 梯田里的黄土不再在碎岩石上- 在非常完美层压的黏土丰富的沉积物上。

sentences.en: There the soil is from weathered limestone soil or loess.
sentences.cn: 那里的土壤是经过风化作用的石灰石土壤或黄土.

sentences.en: Wind - deposited sediment called loess occurs in many places.
sentences.cn: 被称为黄土的风成沉积物,在许多地区均有.

sentences.en: Xiashu Loess is a kind of geographical special soil in Zhenjiang area.
sentences.cn: 下蜀黄土是镇江地区广泛分布的一种特殊性土层.

trans.tran_en: a light-coloured fine-grained accumulation of clay and silt particles that have been deposited by the wind
